title: 2.1 Master Challenge 1
question: You have to develop a Calculator app - a mathematical tool that assists you in solving various calculations. With this app, you should be able to perform basic arithmetic operations, solve complex equations, evaluate trigonometric functions, and even handle scientific computations.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
